channel.title: TIMES NOW | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/Timesnow

item.title: Kolkata: Union Minister and We
item.description: Kolkata: Union Minister and West Bengal BJP President Sukanta Majumdar joins the protest. BJP has called for a 12-hour 'Bengal Bandh'. #BJP #BengalBandh #News VC - ANI

item.description: Viral Video: An unidentified womanâ€™s miraculous escape from death at a railway station in Basheerabad of Vikarabad district, was captured on camera. #ViralVideo #Telangana #RailwayStation

item.title: West Bengal | Police detains B
item.description: West Bengal | Police detains BJP leader Locket Chatterjee who joined protest after BJP's call for 12-hour 'Bharat Bandh' at Kolkata's Bata Chowk. #BJP #WestBengal #LocketChatterjee #News VC - ANI
